title: Left abandoned self-sufficiency
text:
ANALYSIS/OPINION:

I’m a lifelong independent voter, age 74. For pretty much all of my life, the adage I’ve adopted has been, “Teach a man to fish, and he will survive on his own.” Today, when I listen to the Democrats, teaching citizens to fend for themselves is not part or their discussion. I don’t see that as a long-term plan for success or survival. If this blatant omission continues to be part of the Democrats’ game plan, they will lose my vote.

TOM TYSCHPER

Gilbert, Ariz.

Sign up for Daily Opinion Newsletter
